definition: distributed in portions (often equal) on the basis of a plan or purpose
details:
adjective
- distributed in portions (often equal) on the basis of a plan or purpose
= synonyms: divided up, shared, shared out
- having a median strip or island between lanes of traffic moving in opposite directions
= example: having a median strip or island between lanes of traffic moving in opposite directions
= synonyms: dual-lane
- separated into parts or pieces
= example: separated into parts or pieces
